channel.title: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBlbMCW1US0[/url]
Basically, I noticed several unused (or sparingly used?) gibbing sounds while digging through the sound folders in BM, so I decided to try applying them to some of the soft/loud impact sounds for bodies, along with some other sounds I had and this was the result.
EDIT:
[url='https://www.mediafire.com/download/eixsro5qu7y89q5/GibMod.rar']Download[/url]

item.title: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
Xeoxer:

Among different gibs (liver, brain, arm, leg etc.) there’s also a human skull, and that is the only gib that the new impact sounds don’t fit. I didn’t mean hitting with a crowbar, just tossing the gibs around.

I had a look for the gib skull and I could not find it. Did you manage to find the model?

Plastic head crab crates are also the wrong material there a probably a few dotted around the game that is models with the wrong material type.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod

item.title: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
I ported these to l4d2 a while back. Works a lot better with that game’s dismemberment system than the one in BM

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod

item.title: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
the impacts also play on crowbar hits too…

Ha Ha I like the idea, perhaps the vmt for the gib skull could be altered to be a different material and then the sound can be played that way?

I am thinking a sound similar to at the end of conan the barbarian (original arnie version) where he throws the head down the stairs

https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Creating_a_Material

edit the vmt

Then you may need to add a script entry for the material surface sound in the script that contains the material sounds.

example - bone

it is probably material flesh at the moment

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod

item.title: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
Ronster:

This would need coding, obviously the flesh impact would sound fine for a bullet to the head, but I think you are talking about when you hit something in the head with the crowbar?

I too want the thud sound like the original but unless someone knows how I think this is as good as we can have it at the moment.

Among different gibs (liver, brain, arm, leg etc.) there’s also a human skull, and that is the only gib that the new impact sounds don’t fit. I didn’t mean hitting with a crowbar, just tossing the gibs around.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod

item.title: Black Mesa Gib sound/Body Impact mod
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
Xeoxer:

The only issue with this work is that a human skull also has this flesh-like impact sound, while it shouldn’t have. Is it possible to fix that?

This would need coding, obviously the flesh impact would sound fine for a bullet to the head, but I think you are talking about when you hit something in the head with the crowbar?

I too want the thud sound like the original but unless someone knows how I think this is as good as we can have it at the moment.

Read full topic
